scripts.db:push:dev: pnpm --filter @myapp/shared build && NODE_ENV=dev pnpm drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:push:prod: pnpm --filter @myapp/shared build && NODE_ENV=prod pnpm drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:push:localprod: pnpm --filter @myapp/shared build && NODE_ENV=localprod pnpm drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:rps:dev: pnpm run db:reset:dev && pnpm run db:push:dev && pnpm run db:seed:dev
scripts.db:rps:prod: pnpm run db:reset:prod && pnpm run db:push:prod && pnpm run db:seed:prod
scripts.db:rps:localprod: pnpm run db:reset:localprod && pnpm run db:push:localprod && pnpm run db:seed:localprod
scripts.prod: pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.localprod: pnpm run build && pnpm run start:localprod
